sys_ui_macro.name: Hide_form_action_container
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<style>

    .form_action_button_container  {visibility: hidden}
    .section_header_content_no_scroll {background-color: white;} 

    .form_body {padding-block-end: 0!important;background-color: white;}
    body.-polaris .section_header_content_no_scroll { background-color: white !important;} 

    div#fa1459811bdf21105f45ed35624bcb2d {
    margin-top: 28px;
}
.related-links-wrapper{
    display : none;
}

.timingDiv {
display: none!important;
}
</style>


<script>

    var gu = new GlideURL(); 
    gu.setFromCurrent();   
    var isUIPage = gu.getParam("sysparm_uipage");  

    if(isUIPage=='true'){

        document.getElementsByClassName("navbar-default")[0].style.display = "none";
        document.getElementsByClassName("ui_action_container_overflow")[0].style.visibility = 'hidden';
        document.getElementsByClassName("navbar_ui_actions")[0].style.visibility = 'hidden'; 
        //document.getElementsByClassName("form_action_button_container")[0].style.visibility = 'hidden';

    }
    </script>
</j:jelly>
